A Spring component that handles mapping between internal device entities and external API response DTOs for device management operations.

## Key Components

**Main Mapping Methods:**
- `toDeviceResponse(Machine, List<Tag>)` - Maps a Machine entity to DeviceResponse DTO with tags
- `toDevicesResponse(CountedGenericQueryResult<Machine>)` - Maps paginated device query results  
- `toDevicesResponseWithTags()` - Maps device results including associated tags per device
- `toDeviceFilterResponse(DeviceFilters)` - Maps device filter criteria to response format

**Helper Methods:**
- `toTagResponse(Tag)` - Maps Tag entities to TagResponse DTOs
- `toDeviceFilterOptions()` - Maps filter criteria to filter option DTOs
- `toTagFilterOptions()` - Maps tag filter options for UI dropdowns

## Usage Example

```java
@Autowired
private DeviceMapper deviceMapper;

// Map single device with tags
Machine machine = machineRepository.findById(deviceId);
List<Tag> tags = tagRepository.findByDeviceId(deviceId);
DeviceResponse response = deviceMapper.toDeviceResponse(machine, tags);

// Map paginated device results
CountedGenericQueryResult<Machine> queryResult = deviceService.searchDevices(criteria);
DevicesResponse devicesResponse = deviceMapper.toDevicesResponse(queryResult);

// Map device filters for UI
DeviceFilters filters = deviceService.getAvailableFilters();
DeviceFilterResponse filterResponse = deviceMapper.toDeviceFilterResponse(filters);
```
